hits.Instructions: Click to interact and drag items to synthesize or merge!
hits.Key Features: March & Merge, Restore & Build, Easy to play

hits.Title: Farm Connect
hits.Description: Connect the pets in this fun Farm Connect game. Match all the identical mahjong tiles. Enjoy all the different designs and colorful tiles.
hits.Instructions: Tap or mouse

hits.Title: Cube Connect
hits.Description: Move the blocks and guide the ball to the goal. After a period of time, the ball starts to move. Connect the paths quickly so that the ball doesn't fall. Some blocks can jump and some can warp.
hits.Instructions: Drag to move blocks.

hits.Title: Color Race Obby
hits.Description: Color Race Obby is an exciting game inspired by Roblox and Obby. Compete with players online on a field of colored blocks. Enter the race and become the champion! Join the fun!
hits.Instructions:
Your goal is to run to the finish line. Watch carefully what color will be next and have time to run to the block of this color.

Controls on the computer:
W,A,S,D - move the character
Space - jump
Mouse movement - camera movement
Tab - show cursor

Controls on the phone:
Left joystick - move the character
Right button - jump
Swipe on the screen - camera movement
hits.Key Features:
Color Race Obby is an exciting game inspired by Roblox and Obby, where your skills and reactions will be tested like never before!

Start in a race on a field filled with bright colored blocks. But be careful, periodically all the blocks disappear except for one color. Your goal - in time to stand on the right color and continue the race.

Earn game currency and get cool Robles looks. Compete with other players online and prove that you are the best in this color race. Get to the finish line the fastest and become the champion!

Color Race Obby is not just a game, it's a test for your speed, agility and strategy. Start playing now!

hits.Title: Supermarket Manager Simulator
hits.Description: Supermarket Manager Simulator is a business game. Have you ever fantasized about running your supermarket in your childhood?  Play as the store manager in this game and stock up on a variety of goods, from chips and fries to meats, burgers, vegetables, and fruits. From stocking, and shelving to selling, you will be the one to take care of it!  Don't hesitate to start your entrepreneurial journey now and become a great store tycoon!
hits.Instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

hits.Title: Beauty puzzle
hits.Description: A puzzle game in which you need to connect the pieces in a line. To successfully complete the game, it is important to use its mechanics to your advantage
hits.Instructions:
1. Connecting the lines will be easy at first, but as time goes by, the speed will increase.  Once you connect a line, it will disappear and earn you points!  If the playing field overflows and a piece is on a line and stays on it for a long time, you will lose and start the game over!
2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the game. Tap the screen to make the figure scroll or swipe down to make the figure fall. 
3. enjoy the game, become the leader and top the list!
hits.Key Features: This is an exciting game in which you have to set a record! You can compete with your friends and colleagues to see who will score more points! The game has a special play area where the pieces fall down! Your task is to line up more lines and get the maximum number of points! Try to become the first on the leaderboard and prove your skill! Play and enjoy this exciting game!

hits.Title: Water Dig Rescue
hits.Description: Dive into the captivating world of "Water Dig Rescue," a physics-based puzzle game where strategy and water manipulation go hand-in-hand. Players carve their way through sand to guide streams of water, aiming to fill a waiting truck at each level's end. With a touch of ingenuity and the laws of physics, can you solve the puzzles and achieve a triumphant splash?
hits.Instructions:
Objective: Your goal is to collect enough water in the destination truck to win the level.
Interact: Click and drag on the sand to dig a path for the water to flow.
Collect: Guide the water to collect golden balls for extra points.
Solve: Navigate through a variety of obstacles and utilize the environment to lead water to the truck.
Advance: Complete the level to move onto the next, with each stage increasing in complexity.

hits.Title: Hungry Snake Io
hits.Description: Hungry Snake.io is a classic game. Here you can try three game modes, Endless mode, Toilet Man, and Monster Brawl. Please note that there can be no collision between worms! In addition, our team takes user experience very seriously, we are always happy to improve the game so that every player can have a better gaming experience, if you encounter any difficulties during the game, please feel free to leave us a message!
hits.Instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

hits.Title: Car Service Tycoon
hits.Description: Car Service Tycoon is a fun game designed for car enthusiasts. Open your own garage and start with a large collection of vehicles. In the game, you can fix the engines, repair brake systems, and fix electrical problems to get the vehicles ready for the road again. There's also the option to customize the exterior of the vehicles; you can change the paintwork, modify the rims and upgrade the exhaust systems.
hits.Instructions: You can control the character by touching or using "MOUSE" or "W,A,S,D".
hits.Key Features:
Make a different trade in each level to accelerate and grow your profits.
You can customize vehicles with special colors and change the look of the vehicle.
Unlock levels by earning money and expand your garage.

hits.Title: Family Farm
hits.Description:
Welcome to Family Farm!
Grow your farm by planting and growing crops.
Firstly, you need to have an available plot to plant. Buy it with your money.
Then, open the shop to buy a seed and plant it on the plot.
Harvest the profit once the production time is finished.
You can sell a crop to plant another one.
You can also upgrade the crops to increase their productivity.
Enjoy the game and let's become a bonafide farmer!
hits.Instructions:
Click the "shovel" button and choose a plot to buy it.
Click the "dollar sign" button to sell crops.
Click the "leaf" button to upgrade productivity.
Buy seeds and special items in the shop.
Click the crops once the production time is finished to collect golds.
Click the "gift" button to visit the lucky wheel where you can spin to win prizes.
Visit the game everyday to earn daily reward (an extra spin).
hits.Key Features:
- Many seeds/special items.
- Daily reward

hits.Title: Let's Catch
hits.Description: Let's Catch is super addictive puzzle game with  Minimalistic & Elegantly designed approach,which lets you think out of the box and sharpen your mind.The Goal is to drag n merge the same numbered blocks. The challenge increases gradually with large numbered blocks.You get to enjoy this amazing new puzzle game while improving your memory, concentration levels and reflexes at the same time.
hits.Instructions: Drag n merge the same numbered blocks
hits.Key Features:
- Minimalistic & elegant design
- Smooth & simple controls
- Easy to learn and play

hits.Title: 2 Player Dark Racing
hits.Description: Get your vehicle and race it on the tracks against different drivers. In this 2 Player Dark Racing game, you can play against your friends in the 2-player split-screen or single-player mode.
hits.Instructions: Use Arrow Keys (Player 1) or WASD (Player 2) to Drive.

hits.Title: Shoe Designer
hits.Description: Wonderful news for all of you fashion divas who are obsessed with designer shoes! Fabulous new shoes designing game “Shoe Designer” is here to let you design your unique pumps, sandals or stilettos!
hits.Instructions: Mouse to Play.

hits.Title: Hide and Build a Bridge!
hits.Description:
Welcome to the exciting world of "Hide and Build a Bridge"!

In this exciting game your goal is to collect blocks on the level and build a bridge from them to the portal. But be careful! There are also other players in the level who are trying to reach the goal together with you, and a seeker who breaks bridges and catches runners.
hits.Instructions:
Collect blocks on the level, build a bridge from them to the portal and don't get caught by the seeker!

PC controls: use the W/A/S/D buttons to control your character.

Control on mobile device: tap the screen and use the joystick to control the character.

hits.Title: Halloween Stickman
hits.Description: On Halloween when the air was thick with mystery and the streets were decorated with carved pumpkins, you were ready to enjoy the spooky night. But Stickman, your sly friend and perennial trickster set you up and you are in trouble. It's time to punish him in every possible way. How? Yes, you have the super ability to rewind time. So take advantage of it and  punish your enemy on Halloween!
hits.Instructions:
Use your computer mouse to control the game.
If you have a mobile device, then use the stylus or your finger.
You need to watch the story animation and choose the way to punish Stickman. You need to press the buttons to see all the punishments of Stickman.

hits.Title: PopCats: Merge the cats!
hits.Description: An incredibly cute game full of purring and cats. You have to connect identical cats to get bigger and bigger fuzzies. Each of them has its own story! Get to know them and connect the two biggest ones to win! Earn points and become the best cat on the leaderboard!
hits.Instructions: Connect identical seals into larger seals by clicking on the screen with your finger or mouse. To get to know a cat and find out its history, click on its image in the bottom panel. Make sure that the cats do not reach the top line, otherwise the game will end! You can change the next cat for watching ads. Use yarn to remove the interfering cat, and remember - the main thing here is not to miss! Collect points to take a leading position in the player rankings.

hits.Title: Jewel Miner Quest
hits.Description: The dazzling world of gems awaits! Participate in thrilling events within limited moves or time. Solve captivating puzzles, complete fun tasks, and enjoy daily bonuses. Discover many terrific surprises with every move and see how far you can go.
hits.Instructions: The game features limitless match-3 levels. Players connect three or more jewels to clear levels and progress. Four unique boosters help overcome challenges. Daily login rewards, the Lucky Wheel, and special tasks offer opportunities to earn prizes and enhance the gameplay experience.
hits.Key Features:
Endless game
3 puzzle events
4 powerful boosters
Special daily rewards

hits.Title: Real Flight Simulator
hits.Description: Real Flight Simulator plays like an airplane driving simulation game with 3D models. In 6 levels, you can learn how to drive an airplane including starting, steering, and landing. All of the complicated instrument panels are simplified for players to learn. The more expensive the airplane you drive, the better acceleration of it you can enjoy including the Power, Speed, Solution, and Brake. Good luck in the sky!
hits.Instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

hits.Title: Qube 2048
hits.Description: We present a unique arcade game that combines the dynamic gameplay of Q*bert and the mechanics of 2048!  You start with the number 2 and move across a grid of blocks, doubling its value. The goal is to reach the maximum number by planning your moves and avoiding obstacles.
hits.Instructions: The goal of the game is to reach the highest possible number by moving across a grid of blocks, doubling numbers, and avoiding obstacles, which requires strategic planning and precise moves.

hits.Title: Mini Golf Saga
hits.Description: Embark on an immersive golf adventure with Mini Golf Saga, a captivating 3D mini-golf game set against the backdrop of a picturesque beach, featuring diverse golf levels where precision is key to achieving the lowest hit count for a high score; facing limited hits per level, strategize your shots wisely and, when needed, watch a rewarded video ad to replenish your chances and continue the saga of sun-soaked golfing excitement.
hits.Instructions: Mini Golf Saga invites you to a 3D beachside mini-golf experience, challenging players to achieve the lowest hit count, strategically managing limited hits per level, and offering the option to watch a rewarded video ad for additional chances.
hits.Key Features:
- Beach Setting: Immerse yourself in a vibrant beach setting, enhancing the mini-golf experience with stunning visuals.
- Diverse Golf Levels: Explore a variety of mini-golf levels, each presenting unique challenges and opportunities for precision shots.
- Hit Management: Strategize your shots wisely as you face limited hits per level, aiming for the lowest hit count to attain a high score.
- Rewarded Video Ads: Watch a rewarded video ad to replenish your hits, providing a strategic option for players aiming to conquer challenging levels.
- High Score Challenge: Compete for the highest score by showcasing your mini-golf skills in this sun-soaked golfing saga.

hits.Title: Solitaire Klondike
hits.Description: The addictive game you’ve been playing on your computer for years now goes wherever you do. Whether you know it as Patience, Klondike, or just Solitaire, this popular game is one of the best games around.
hits.Instructions: Tap or drag cards to arrange them in descending order with alternating colors. When you can, move cards up to the foundation to sort all of the suits from Ace to King. You can draw one card at a time for a more relaxing game, or draw three for a challenge to train your brain!
hits.Key Features:
♥️ Levels & Titles: Earn points every time you play to level up and achieve new titles
♠️ Winning Deals: Play deals where you know there is at least one winning solution
♦️ Leaderboards & Statistics: See how you stack up against other players, or try to beat your own high score
♣️ Unlimited hints and Undos

hits.Title: War Nations.io
hits.Description:
War Nations is a real-time multiplayer game where you compete with other players to conquer the map and be the last nation standing.

Drag and drop your troops to attack and conquer a target nation. You will conquer another nation if you sent more attackers than their defenders. 

Be the last nation standing to win. Fans of strategy war games with love this game.
hits.Instructions: Compete with other players to become the strongest nation.
hits.Key Features:
- Extremely simple controls
- 2-4 players in a room
- Unlimited rooms

hits.Title: Woodoku Block Puzzle

hits.Title: We Will Not Survive
hits.Description: Survive the apocalypse in We Will Not Survive, an idle tower defense game! Upgrade weapons, harvest resources, and fight relentless zombie waves to protect your base. Are you ready to defend and thrive?

hits.Title: Galactic Golf Solitaire
hits.Description:
Enjoy a relaxing round of Golf Solitaire, a fun and easy-to-play card game. The goal is to clear the board by matching cards that are one rank higher or lower than the one on the discard pile. Don’t worry about suits—just focus on the numbers! If you’re stuck, you can draw from the deck to keep the game going. Play at your own pace and see how many rounds you can win.

Perfect for a quick break or to unwind at the end of the day!
hits.Instructions:
Objective: Clear the board by moving all cards to the waste pile.
Setup: 7 columns of 5 face-up cards; the remaining cards form the draw pile.
Gameplay: Click the card from the board to move it to the waste pile if it’s one rank higher or lower than the top card of the waste pile. Suits don't matter. Aces can be placed on Kings or Twos. If no moves are possible, draw a card from the draw pile.
Win: Clear all cards from the board.
Loss: No moves left, and the draw pile is empty.

hits.Key Features:
Bonus items:
Rocket Bonus Items
Tap 5 items the same color to create a ROCKET bonus item.
ROCKET destroys vertical or horizontal rows on the game field.
Bomb Bonus Items
Tap 6 items the same color to create a BOMB bonus item. 
BOMB destroys 9 game items around.
Pinwheel Bonus Items
Tap 9 or more items the same color to create a PINWHEEL bonus item. PINWHEEL destroys all game items the same color. Just tap on it.

Neutral box - has 3 levels. Does not move when objects fall. Will be destroyed after destroying any items near this block.
When you choose the goal of the game to destroy colored boxes, you will see an icon common to all colors.
Neutral ball - Moves from place when objects fall. Will be destroyed after destroying any items near this block.
Colored boxes - Moves from place when objects fall. Will be removed after destroying items of the same color near the blocks.
When you choose the goal of the game to destroy colored boxes, you will see an icon common to all colors
Cage - keeps an item inside. Can be remove after destroying this item.
Bubble box- Does not move when objects fall. Can be removed after destroying an item inside. 
Aquarium - Unbreakable. Destroy the main objects near the aquarium to get a fish.
Snail - has 2 levels. Destroy the main objects near to get the snail.
Boosters
Rocket - destroys vertical or horizontal rows on the game field.
Bomb - destroys 9 game items around.
Pinwheel- destroys all game items the same color. Just tap on it. 
Hammer destroys one item on the game field.
Torpedo destroys one horizontal raw.
Pot destroys one vertical column.
Randomize shuffles the main game objects.
Extra Moves adds 5 steps after a loss so that the player can continue the game

hits.Title: Animal Link
hits.Description: Animal Link is a puzzle game, the goal is to remove all the squares by eliminating the same pattern. The rules of the game are simple and require a certain amount of observation and quick reaction ability.
hits.Instructions:
1. Connection: Connect two lines with the same pattern
2. Turn: The cable changes direction at the turn
3. Obstacles: Other blocks block two lines of the same pattern
4. Countdown: You need to complete the level within the specified time, or the game will fail
5. Tips: If you can't find a matching square, you can use the tips function to get some help
hits.Key Features:
1. Experiment with varying tactics: Clearing one square might simplify connections for others. Focus on the optimal sequence of removal to reduce the number of obstacles.
2. Pay attention and retain memory: At times, it's necessary to recall the locations of certain blocks that are potential matches but currently not connectable. Through careful observation and memory, you can successfully match these blocks in future moves.
3. Act swiftly: The game's time constraint demands rapid decision-making. Minimize hesitation in selecting blocks to effectively utilize the allotted time.
Through these rules, terms and techniques, you can fully enjoy the fun of Connect Animal. Challenge your powers of observation, memory, and decision-making, and try different strategies and methods to get the highest score

⭐️ Wizards' Arcadia is a fantasy medieval world where magic and wonders are commonplace. The main character is a wizard who lives in a peaceful kingdom where humans and magic users live in harmony.

⭐️ However, the peaceful existence of the kingdom was disrupted when villains attacked its territory, seeking to seize the magical energy present in this world. As one of the defenders of the kingdom, the wizard stood guard at his home and began to fight against the villains.
hits.Instructions:
Control spells using a spell panel displayed on the screen. To create a spell connect cells with the required symbols by swiping their finger on the screen. Then control the spell using a joystick. You must aim it in the right direction to hit enemies and deal damage, or use the spell to defend and heal themselves and allies.

To win, you must defeat waves of enemies that come at us. To lose a level, enemies need to destroy our castle door.
hits.Key Features:
-Strategic Kingdom Defense: The main objective is to protect your kingdom from waves of enemies.
-Spell Crafting: Create and combine spells to use in combat.
Dynamic Obstacles: Variety of enemy types including close combat enemies, tanks, archers, and bosses.
-Upgrade System: Collect rewards to upgrade spells and unlock new equipment.
-Real-Time Controls: Use a spell panel and joystick for real-time spell casting and aiming.
-Multiple Enemy Types: Including close combat enemies, heavy close combat enemies, tanks, archers, catapults, bombers, healers, and bosses.
-Interactive Gameplay: Gameplay involves a combination of quick decision-making and strategy.

hits.Title: Solitaire Klondike
hits.Description:
Step into the timeless challenge of Solitaire Klondike, an addictive HTML5 card game designed for fans of classic solitaire. Enjoy hours of relaxing gameplay with this popular version of Klondike Solitaire, where players arrange cards in descending order and alternate colors to win. If you need a fresh start, simply shuffle new cards to explore different winning strategies!
Perfect for anyone who loves solitaire,  Solitaire Klondike combines strategy, patience, and quick thinking.
hits.Instructions:
With four foundation spots at the top, you’ll need to sort each suit—Clubs, Hearts, Diamonds, and Spades—in ascending order. Track your progress with time and move counters that challenge you to improve each game, making every move count.
For an extra boost,  Solitaire Klondike offers helpful power-ups, including Hint, Solver, and Undo options. Customize your experience with a variety of game skins to keep the visual experience fresh and engaging.

hits.Instructions:

Screw a bolt - Click on the hole with the left mouse button into which you want to screw a bolt.

How to play: Smartphone

Screw the bolt - Click on the hole you want to screw the bolt into.

hits.Title: Stack Battle.io
hits.Description:
It is a fun and casual puzzle. In the game, the game screen is fresh and simple, and the cute cartoon style is very eye-catching. The biggest highlight is the addition of tower defense battles to the brick-moving gameplay. The game level is very rich, and the gameplay is very simple. 
You can control the movement of the character by pressing and sliding on the screen.

hits.Title: Halloween Magic Connect
hits.Description:
A fun and addictive hyper casual game. Matching all the pairs of Halloween Magic tiles to clear the board. Complete as many levels as possible to get high scores and raise your name on the global leaderboard. Each hint will reveal a pair of Halloween Magic tiles, use it wisely. Pay attention on the timer, don't let it end before clearing the board.
When being out of moves, the board will be shuffled automatically if there is any Shuffle item left, if not, the game will be over.
hits.Instructions:
Tap on each pair of Halloween Magic tiles which can be connected by maximum 3 line segments (without touching the other tiles).
Use hints wisely and keep an eye on the Shuffle items left as well as the timer.
hits.Key Features:
- 3 difficulties (corresponding to the board sizes): Easy, Medium, Hard
- Showing hints option
- Shuffle option
- Global leaderboard
- Supporting 15 languages: English (US), Dutch, French, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Hindi, Japanese, Chinese (simplified), Vietnamese, Turkish, Italian, Indonesian, Arabic

hits.Title: Crash the Robot!
hits.Description:
An addictive physics puzzle game, the goal of which is to crash the robot on each level in all sorts of ways or give him the opportunity to do so himself. Arrange items from your inventory and trigger a chain of events to reach the goal! Also use cannons and jumppads.

The game has over 50 levels +5 bonus levels!
hits.Instructions:
Drag items from the inventory at the top of the screen onto the game scene and start the chain of events by clicking on the "Start" button at the bottom, middle of the screen.

To fire the cannon, turn it to the desired angle, simultaneously select the force of the shot and release it. The shot will be fired automatically if the number of shots is indicated on the cannon.

Controls:
PC: mouse. 'P'/'Esc' - pause. 'R' - restart level.
hits.Key Features:
A cartoon-style physics puzzle game in which you have to destroy the robot in all sorts of ways. To do this, use bombs, weights, crates, cannons, jumppads, etc.

There are two main types of levels in the game:

Levels with items in your inventory. This is the majority of game levels. Correctly place items from your inventory on the game level to start a continuous chain of events and click on the “Start” button at the bottom, in the middle of the screen. If done correctly, the robot will be destroyed as a result.

Levels without inventory, but with cannons and jumppads. In these levels, you need to shoot the cannons accurately and reflect objects with the jumppads in order to press the correct buttons, and as a result, destroy the robot.

Game Features:

Simple and addictive gameplay

Fun and diverse levels that will not let you get bored

More than fifty main game levels and bonus levels

Pleasant and atmospheric music

Achievements and leaderboard

You can play on both computer and phone

Game Modes:
Single-Player: In this mode, players must survive for as long as possible.

Two-Player: This competitive mode pits two players against each other. The first player to fall into the lava loses, and the remaining player emerges victorious.
hits.Instructions:
1Player :-

A & D - Movement,
W - Jump,
W & S - Climb/Decline Ladder
V - Dash,
B - Punch

2Player :-

Left Arrow & Right Arrow :- Movement,
Up Arrow - Jump,
Up Arrow & Down Arrow - Climb/Decline Ladder,
K - Dash,
L - Punch

hits.Title: Strategy of war. Tanks and helicopters.
hits.Description:
"Strategy of war" is an exciting strategy war game where the player has to control squads of tanks and helicopters, develop his base, choose battle tactics and fight the enemy.

The game offers a wide range of equipment and weapons, a variety of missions and tasks, as well as the opportunity to improve and develop their forces. It is important to properly allocate resources, as well as use tactical techniques to defeat the enemy.
hits.Instructions:
The game "Strategy of war" is the implementation of a modern RTS game with the necessary game mechanics, such as base management, command of troops, military tactics (including both defensive and offensive tactics), base capture, ground and air battles.

The main goal of the game is to capture and hold all enemy bases.

Your base is green. Enemy bases are red and yellow. Neutral bases are gray.
The combat units in the game are tanks and helicopters.

Go on an epic boat trip with River Adventure the fast-paced arcade game. Avoid rocks and bring your boat safely down the stream. Jump onto your canoe and face the challenges of the unforgiving river in 
River Adventure. You must survive this ride, so be careful and keep your eyes on the screen! From rocks to logs, the surface of the river is littered with all kinds of objects. Change your direction to avoid hitting the obstacles.
Time your moves correctly and collect as many diamonds as you can to unlock different character models. Complete missions to collect more 
diamonds!
hits.Instructions:
Control your character through the river. Watch out for obstacles such as rocks and logs. Collect diamonds to unlock different characters and complete
missions.
hits.Key Features:
9 different characters to unlock
30 different missions to complete
Challenging and addictive gameplay
Colorful 2D graphics

hits.Title: Bouncy Barn
hits.Description:
Bouncy Barn is a lively farm simulation game where players explore the charming world of farm life. Care for cute animals like chickens, cows, and goats. 

Feed and nurture your animals to keep them happy, and in return, they’ll provide valuable produce like eggs and milk. Harvest these goodies and sell them at the market to earn profits for expanding and upgrading your farm. With vibrant graphics and engaging gameplay, Bouncy Barn provides a fun escape to create your dream farm!

hits.Title: Mahjong Masters
hits.Description:
Enter the world of Mahjong Masters, where classic Mahjong meets fast-paced tile matching! 
In this exciting game, players have 2 minutes to match as many Mahjong tile pairs as possible. 
Each round is a thrilling battle against a new opponent. 
Accumulate battle points with each victory to climb the leaderboard and become the ultimate Mahjong Master.

Computer
Mouse: Click to select and match Mahjong tile pairs.

Mobile
Touchscreen: Tap tiles to select and match pairs.

Match as many tile pairs as possible in 2 minutes!

Fast-Paced Gameplay: Match as many tile pairs as you can in 2 minutes.
Competitive Battles: Face off against a new opponent every round.
Leaderboard Rankings: Earn battle points to rise through the ranks.
Classic Mahjong Aesthetics: Enjoy beautifully designed Mahjong tiles.
Become the Champion: Aim for the top spot and be crowned the Mahjong Master.

hits.Title: Daddy Rabbit
hits.Description:
Daddy Rabbit must find all his lost babies inside the most amazing underground burrow you've ever seen. These baby rabbits sleep peacefully everywhere, but when daddy rabbit passes by, they will follow him all the way.
Baby bunnies will follow dad but will cry if they are awake and his dad wanders too far. When that happens, the zombies will get upset and go straight to eat them. That's when daddy rabbit will defend his sons with a carrot punch and give those evil zombies what they deserve.

hits.Title: Daily Wordler
hits.Description:
Test your vocabulary and puzzle-solving skills with Daily Wordler, the ultimate word-guessing game that challenges your mind every day! With a simple yet addictive gameplay mechanic, Daily Wordler is perfect for fans of word games and brain teasers. 

Your goal is to guess the hidden word by entering valid words and using color-coded feedback to narrow down the solution. Yellow tiles indicate correct letters in the wrong position, while blue tiles signal correct letters in the right spot.
hits.Instructions: Guess the hidden word using clever logic and feedback clues in the addictive and challenging Daily Wordler game!
hits.Key Features:
Daily Puzzles: A new word challenge every day to keep your brain sharp and entertained.

Feedback System: Color-coded tiles help you narrow down your guesses with each attempt.

Simple and Intuitive Design: Enjoy a smooth, relaxing word-guessing experience for all skill levels.

hits.Title: Parking Jam Escape
hits.Description:
Fun car game! Addictive puzzle about cars 3d
Park each car correctly, all the cars must fall into place so that to free the collection truck from GTA
Train your brain - solve car puzzles 3d!
hits.Instructions:
The rules of the puzzle are simple:
▶ to move the car to the left or right ↔️ - you need to make a swipe on the typewriter, respectively, to the left or right.
▶ to move the car up or down ↕️ - you need to swipe up or down on the car, respectively.
▶ make sure your car can drive out of the parking lot to the right past the road markings.
hits.Key Features:
?Features of the game:

⚈ Become a parking master.
Make your way from a novice driving a cash-in-transit car. Upgrade your skills in the puzzle game with unlocking cars and escaping from the parking lot. Hundreds of levels will help you relieve stress and relax.

⚈ Gather a collection of cars.
Different classes of cars are available in the game: SUV, convertible, sports coupe, sports car, JDM car, limousine, executive sedan, classic car, pickup truck.

⚈ It's hard to find a better solution.
Draw a path for the car with your finger and avoid collisions. Realistic car explosion effects occur with each collision. You can easily move all the cars on the board, but don't forget that your goal is to escape from the parking lot to the exit. Finding the path will be quite difficult, especially on more difficult levels. All you need to do is clear the traffic and cross the parking line.

hits.Title: Minesweeper
hits.Description:
Welcome to the world of Minesweeper, a game of mind!  Here you can challenge yourself by trying to beat the campaign of increasingly difficult levels, customize the game in every way, enjoy smooth animation and learn to play the game if you’re a beginner.

The objective of the game is to clear a rectangular board containing hidden "mines" or bombs without detonating any of them, with help from clues about the number of neighboring mines in each field. If a square containing a mine is revealed, the player loses the game. If no mine is revealed, a digit is instead displayed in the square, indicating how many adjacent squares contain mines; if no mines are adjacent, the square becomes blank, and all adjacent squares will be recursively revealed. The player uses this information to deduce the contents of other squares and may either safely reveal each square or mark the square as containing a mine.

Remember: any ship can be a minesweeper… once.
hits.Instructions: Click or tap on a square to reveal the number of mines in the adjacent squares. Detailed tutorial is included.
hits.Key Features:
+Classic and modern skins 
+Adjust the board size and difficulty for both first-time players and experts 
+Fast and smooth gameplay 
+Missions mode with a hundred levels to conquer

hits.Title: Hexa Sort: Winter Edition
hits.Description: Step into a mesmerizing world of winter puzzles with Hexa Sort! More than just a game, it’s a journey into a frosty realm where every hexagonal tile sparkles like a snowflake. hits.Instructions:
How to Play Hexa Sort: Winter Edition
Goal: Arrange hexagonal tiles to complete lines or specific patterns and clear the board.
How to Play: Drag tiles from the bottom of the screen onto the board and place them strategically.
Scoring: Earn points by completing lines or patterns. The more lines cleared at once, the higher the score.
Game Over: The game ends when there’s no space left for new tiles.

hits.Title: Sudoku 4 in 1
hits.Description: Sudoku is a popular logic-based puzzle game that can be played online. The game Sudoku 4 in 1 consists of a 9x9 grid, divided into nine 3x3 sub-grids. The objective of the game is to fill each of the 81 cells in the grid with a number from 1 to 9, with each number appearing only once in each row, column, and sub-grid.
hits.Instructions:
Click and hold on the empty cell where you want to place the number. Drag the number to the empty cell and release the mouse button.
Remember that each number can only appear once in each row, column, and sub-grid. So, as you fill in numbers, be sure to double-check that they are in the correct places.

With its engaging gameplay, colorful graphics, and challenging levels, Parking Mania is a game that will keep you entertained and engaged for hours. Whether you're a fan of puzzle games, simulation games, or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, this game is sure to provide a fun and exciting experience.

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, there's always a new challenge to overcome and a new level to conquer. The sheer variety of levels in Parking Mania ensures that there's something for everyone, whether you prefer easy and straightforward levels or more complex and challenging ones. With over 250 levels to choose from, the fun and excitement never end in this addictive and entertaining parking game.

hits.Title: Battleship
hits.Description: Battleship is a classic strategy game where you compete against an enemy to sink their fleet of ships. Each player places their ships on a hidden grid and takes turns guessing the locations of the opponent’s ships. The first player to sink all of the enemy’s ships wins the game. It’s a test of strategy, memory, and luck!
hits.Instructions:
Setup: Place your fleet of ships on your grid. Ships can be placed horizontally or vertically but not diagonally.
Gameplay: Take turns with the enemy to call out grid coordinates (e.g., B5) to try and hit each other’s ships.
Hits and Misses: Mark hits and misses on your tracking grid. A hit means part of a ship is located at that coordinate; a miss means no ship is there.
Winning: The game continues until one player sinks all of the opponent’s ships.

hits.Title: Cozy Merge
hits.Description:
Cozy Merge is a nice puzzle game where you merge tiles on a board to reach one million points. Each tile has a number that doubles when merged with identical tiles. Keep placing identical tiles together to create new ones with different numbers and colors.

The game has pleasant music, design and sounds that immerse you in the experience. If you get stuck, use boosters like undo, shuffle, or doubling tiles to solve the puzzle.

Cozy Merge is easy to learn and hard to master.
hits.Instructions:
You have a field on which you need to place tiles with numbers. Place tiles with the same number next to each other to get one tile with the final number multiplied by two. As a result, you need to reach one million.

If you suddenly get stuck, then use powerful boosters: undo last move, shuffle all the tiles on the field and multiplying any tile by two.
hits.Key Features:
- Merge tiles on the field to get the maximum score and reach one million
- Each tile has its own number, which doubles when merged with tiles of the same value
- Boosters: undo, shuffle or double tiles
- Enjoy the cozy vibe, beautiful design, pleasant music and sounds
- Easy to learn and hard to master

The bigger combo of random dice that you create and collect, the higher score you get. Try it and you will love this Random Dice Game & Number Merge Puzzle.

How To Play

◈ Play on 5X5 tiles wood board. Each tile you can only put one dice.
◈ There are 6 Colors Domino dice.
◈ Match three same color dice to merge.
◈ Rotate the dice if you want before placing it.
◈ Match three or more adjacent wooden dice with the same pips to merge them horizontally, vertically, or both.

hits.Title: Sum Shuffle
hits.Description: Sum Shuffle is a puzzle game where players combine numbers to reach a target sum for each level. With both positive and negative numbers, players must strategically select and merge them. The game offers 50 levels, progressing in difficulty. Early levels are easy for beginners, but the complexity increases to challenge experienced puzzle enthusiasts. With smooth transitions and immersive sound effects, Sum Shuffle delivers an entertaining experience suitable for players of all ages.
hits.Instructions: In Sum Shuffle, use simple drag-and-drop controls to merge numbers on the screen. The goal is to reach the exact target sum at each level by combining positive and negative numbers. Strategic thinking is key as you progress through increasingly challenging levels. Achieving the correct sum allows you to advance, and each stage presents a new challenge. Your aim is to stay focused, manage numbers effectively, and enjoy the gradual rise in difficulty.
hits.Key Features:
Features
50 levels with increasing difficulty.
Smooth drag-and-drop controls for intuitive gameplay.
A mix of positive and negative numbers, adding strategic depth.

hits.Title: Relaxing Puzzle Match
hits.Description:
Relaxing Puzzle Match is a match-3 puzzle game with colorful graphics and a relaxing vibe.

Clear the field by arranging tiles in groups horizontally or vertically.

Tiles include moving and block types. Create groups of moving tiles with the same color and destroy them to earn score. Collect block tiles by destroying a group of moving tiles near them.

If you stuck, use boosters: cancel the last move and change the color of the new tile.

The game has many levels with various difficulty.
hits.Instructions:
You must clear a tile-filled field by placing limited new tiles next to the current ones.

Tiles are of two types: moving, marked with an arrow indicating color and direction, and blocks, marked with a target.

Form groups of three or more tiles of the same color horizontally or vertically to destroy them.

Destroy groups of moving tiles next to blocks to collect them.

If you stuck, use boosters to cancel a last move or change a new tile's color.
hits.Key Features:
- A unique combination of puzzle and match-3 mechanics
- Tiles are divided into two types: moving and blocks
- Powerful boosters, including undo last move and change color of new tile
- Many levels with various difficulty and unique goals
- Relaxing vibe, colorful graphics, pleasant music and sounds

hits.Title: Doge Match
hits.Description: Welcome to Doge Match, a delightful and addictive puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours! With 36 meticulously crafted levels, Doge Match offers a unique and challenging experience for players of all ages.
hits.Instructions:
Match Dogs: Swipe to connect dogs of the same color. The more dogs you connect in one move, the more points you earn.
Reach the Target Score: Each level has a specific target score. You need to reach or exceed this score to pass the level.
Earn Stars: Complete the level within the given time to earn 1, 2, or 3 stars. Aim to collect all three stars in every level for the ultimate challenge.
hits.Key Features:
36 Exciting Levels: Test your skills across 36 uniquely designed levels, each offering increasing challenges and the opportunity to earn up to 3 stars.

Star Ratings: Achieve the target score within the limited time to earn 1, 2, or 3 stars. Replay levels to perfect your strategy and collect all stars.

Time-Limited Challenges: Race against the clock to gather as many points as possible. Each level has a time limit, adding an extra layer of excitement and urgency to your gameplay.

Engaging Gameplay: Match dogs of the same color to score points. The more dogs you connect in one move, the higher your score will be.

Beautiful Graphics: Enjoy vibrant, colorful graphics and a user-friendly interface that makes playing Doge Match a visually appealing experience.

Soothing Sounds and Music: Immerse yourself in the game with pleasant sound effects and a relaxing soundtrack that enhance the overall enjoyment.

Intuitive Controls: Swipe to connect dogs with ease. The simple yet addictive mechanics make Doge Match accessible to players of all ages.

hits.Title: Word Mine
hits.Description: Word Mine takes you on a thrilling journey where letters are your treasure! Dive into a world of scrambled chaos and uncover hidden words buried in the grid. With every move, you’ll strike gold, revealing secrets that push you closer to victory. Sharpen your mind, follow the clues, and let the adventure unfold—one word at a time!
hits.Instructions:
1.Rearrange Letters:
Drag and drop the scrambled letters on the grid to form meaningful words.
2.Follow Color Hints:
Green Tile: The letter is in the correct position.
Yellow Tile: The letter is in the correct row or column but not the exact spot.
White Tile: The letter is in the wrong position entirely.
3. Find All Words:
Each level has a set of valid words hidden in the grid.
4. Unlock New Levels:
Progress through increasingly challenging puzzles, with more complex grids.

hits.Title: Screw It Out Jam! - Matching Colored Screws
hits.Description: Welcome to Screw It!, a unique mobile puzzle platformer where screws are the key to solving intricate challenges. Strategically unscrew and reposition fasteners to shift, tilt, or collapse platforms in your favor. With simple tap controls and realistic physics, each level offers an addictive experience that tests your wits and reflexes. Dive into the world of Screw It! and master the art of unscrewing!
hits.Instructions:
Start Playing: The game begins automatically. You’ll jump straight into the first level.

Objective: Tap screws based on the color of the arriving toolbox.

How to Play: When a toolbox arrives, check its color. Tap screws of the same color to screw them in.

Finish the Level: Keep tapping until all screws are matched with the toolbox color.

Tips: Pay close attention to toolbox colors to match screws correctly. Enjoy the game!
hits.Key Features:
Innovative Puzzle Mechanics: Experience a fresh take on puzzle games where screws dictate the outcome of each level. Manipulate platforms by unscrewing bolts, creating chain reactions that test your strategic thinking.

Challenging Levels: Progress through increasingly difficult levels, each with unique setups and puzzles to solve. From simple platforms to intricate mechanisms, every level is a new challenge.

Dynamic Physics Engine: Powered by a sophisticated physics engine, Screw It! offers realistic interactions between screws, platforms, and gravity. Every action has a consequence, making each puzzle a test of both skill and timing.

Customizable Screws and Platforms: Unlock various screw types and platform materials as you advance. Each has its own properties, adding layers of complexity and new strategies to explore.

Engaging Visuals and Soundtrack: Enjoy a visually appealing experience with polished graphics and a soundtrack that enhances the gameplay atmosphere. Each level is designed with attention to detail, ensuring a captivating experience.

Global Leaderboards and Achievements: Compete against players worldwide, climb the leaderboards, and unlock achievements as you master the art of screwing and unscrewing. Prove that you have the best puzzle-solving skills!

Why Screw It!? Whether you're a casual gamer looking for a fun way to pass the time or a puzzle enthusiast seeking a new challenge, Screw It! offers something for everyone. The intuitive controls make it accessible, while the progressively difficult levels ensure that you'll always have a new puzzle to solve. With regular updates and new content, there's always a reason to keep coming back.

Play Screw It! now and start unscrewing your way to victory!

Keywords: Screw game, puzzle platformer, mobile game, physics puzzle, addictive gameplay, strategic puzzles, challenging levels, innovative game mechanics, mobile gaming, platformer game, casual puzzle game, physics-based puzzles, screw mechanics game.

Category: Games > Puzzle > Platformer

Test your memory and concentration as you match each card with its identical partner. Challenge yourself and improve your cognitive skills as you progress through the different levels of difficulty. Kawaii Memory is perfect for all ages and is a great way to pass the time while enjoying the cute and fun visuals.
hits.Instructions: Mouse and Touch

hits.Title: OXY - Words maker
hits.Description:
Welcome to the amazing OXY - Words maker puzzle game! You will embark on a vivid journey filled with oxymorons, synonyms and antonyms. You have to decipher letters and collect words, use your ingenuity to successfully search for words. Get ready for a complete explosion of illusions and magic words!

Each level presents you with new puzzles where not a single word is what it seems. You will unravel the hidden words and decipher a unique combination of letters.
hits.Instructions:
Click on the letters in order to assemble the word. Quickly and accurately collected words bring more bonus points.

If the word is too complicated, use a hint.
hits.Key Features: puzzle, word game, collect words, search for letters, letter, word

hits.Title: Rise Of The Knight
hits.Description:
Move the chess according to its rules. You will be teleported into other spins when moving into the vortex. You should also note that the opponent's chess move according to their rules. So if you place chess in their next move, you will be knocked down. Nevertheless, let's try our best to be the winner and proceed to the more difficult challenge.
Instructions
hits.Instructions: Move the chess with the mouse.

hits.Title: Hungry Box - Eat before time runs out
hits.Description:
GAMEPLAY
Make the "hungry box" eat some food before time running out. You have only 10 seconds. Everytime eat the food, the timer will reset.

There many hidden box's characters like fruits, foods, robots, ghost, superheroes, etc. Reach your best score and unlock all hidden boxes!
hits.Instructions:
INSTRUCTIONS
The "hungry box" will run only through the moving stick. Think quickly to control the length of "red" stick by click and hold on the screen. Make the "hungry box" always inside the screen layout while hunt any foods.
hits.Key Features:
- One touch control
- 2D
- Minimalist
- Simple
- Casual
- Hypercasual

hits.Title: RobyBox - Space Station Warehouse
hits.Description:
Your main task is to place boxes in their designated places to open doors and advance through the levels. Be on the alert! Aggressive bots will chase you. You can destroy them with a powerful arsenal including drill, disks, mines and rockets. Traps are scattered throughout the levels - use them to your advantage by luring the bots into dangerous areas. 
When you need a break from the intense gameplay, head to the warehouse where you can earn gold and solve Sokoban-style puzzles in peace.
hits.Instructions:
To pass the level, complete the tasks in the level description and place the crates in the specified locations on the level.

PC controls:

WASD or arrows - player movement
E - repair
Left mouse button - move to the specified point
Right mouse button or spacebar - use weapons
Mouse wheel or keys 1,2,3,4,5 - weapon selection

Mobile devices:

Use the joystick to move
Fire button to use weapons
Icons on the right side for weapon selection and repair

hits.Title: Bubble Shooter - Farm Fruit
hits.Description: Big Teddy needs your help! Pop the bubbles to rescue the mini teddy bears. Place your bubble shooter aim carefully to clear the maximum amount of bubbles in each level. Features: - Interactive tutorial - 20 challenging levels - Fun theme - Solve bubble sets using a variety of tactics. Use clever theory of angles, target higher bubbles and other tactics to solve each level
hits.Instructions: Pop the bubbles to rescue the mini teddy bears.

hits.Title: Slinger
hits.Description:
A Wild West 3D shooter.

As sheriff you have been assigned to protect a train gold shipment.  Unfortunately many bad guys want to steal that gold.

Being an honorable sheriff, your objective is to disarm the bad guys and destroy the TNT cache they are planning on using to destroy the train.

Good luck!
hits.Instructions:
Desktop:
• Aim Cursor & Left Mouse Click To Fire •
• Middle Mouse Button & Drag To Aim & Zoom •

Mobile:
• Touch & Drag To Aim & Zoom •
• Release To Fire •

hits.Title: Dr. Psycho - Hospital Escape
hits.Description: Doctor Psycho is a survival horror game. Get out of the psycho hospital and don't get caught by Dr. Psycho and his experimental mutants! Find the necessary items to open the door.
hits.Instructions:
WASD - movement
E - action
C - sit down, crawl
G - throw an item
Shift - run

Hide in safe places. Don't get caught by the mutants.

hits.Title: Kill The Dragon - Bridge Block Puzzle
hits.Description:
This is a Puzzle game you have never played before. You have to remove the blocks and build a perfect bridge for the Knight to move to the other side. Knight will kill the dragon and collect the golden coin. You have 50 Levels to complete.
You will have a good experience. Why are you waiting... Play and Enjoy!
hits.Instructions: Tap on the blocks/Bricks to remove the blocks/bricks and build a perfect bridge for the Knight to move to the other side to kill the dragon.
hits.Key Features: 'There are 50 levels' , 'You have to build the bridge' , 'kill the dragon and collect the coin' , 'This game is a puzzle game'

hits.Title: Puzzle - LINES AND KNOTS 1
hits.Description:
Easy to understand mechanics, swap hexagons with lines.
The goal of the player is to assemble a puzzle consisting of nodes.
▪ 150 Levels
▪ Achievements
hits.Instructions: Easy to understand mechanics, swap hexagons with lines.

hits.Title: Spider Hunt
hits.Description:
The cockroaches are proliferating. It would help if you placed bombs to destroy them.
Note that it takes some time for the bomb to explode.
hits.Instructions: Place bomb using mouse.

hits.Title: Snake Puzzle 3D
hits.Description:
Get ready to unravel a tangled knot of snakes to solve this puzzle! ?? Dive into the world of puzzle-solving games to become the legendary tangle master 3D! ??

Knock-knot! Who’s there? Riddle. Riddle who? Riddle me this: how do you unravel a twisted tangle of serpents? With your sharp puzzle-solving skills! ? Welcome to Snake Knot: Sort Puzzle Game where your logic and gaming skills will be tested! Sort serpents to unknot every twisted tangle and free every color snake!
hits.Instructions: Use mouse to move the snake

hits.Title: Unlimited Puzzles
hits.Description: Unlimited Puzzles is a free puzzle game with unlimited gallery of beautiful images from various categories. This is a high quality game and it is a good choice for fans of jigsaw puzzles for all ages. Also, you can create puzzles from your own photos stored on your device!
hits.Instructions: Select one of the images in the game library or on your device. Set the difficulty by choosing how many parts to split the image into. Move the pieces of the puzzle to the artboard to complete the whole image. You can adjust the transparency of the layout, change the scale of the working area, get hints.
hits.Key Features:
▶ Completely free!
▶ New pictures are added regularly!
▶ Create your own puzzles from your photos!
▶ Separation of up to 588 fragments with the possibility of rotation!
▶ Save the game - put together a several pictures at once!
▶ Hints for the location of the puzzle pieces!
▶ Intuitive simple interface!
▶ High resolution HD graphics!

hits.Title: Jelly-Belly. Make the Elephant
hits.Description: It is a puzzle like "Watermelon game" where you need drop animals in a container and try not to cross the top line. Animals of the same type will combine and create a larger animal. Merge the animals to create the biggest animal - Elephant.
hits.Instructions:
Connect same animals with your finger or mouse to get new ones!

Keyboard arrows to move new animal
Spacebar or down arrow to drop the animal

Game will over when animal crossed the top line.

hits.Title: Fight to the end
hits.Description: Players control a protagonist, an assault soldier, who needs to keep moving and fend off enemy attacks during the battle to survive until the end. Each time the protagonist levels up, the player can choose one of three randomly offered buffs, which are divided into skill - type and bonus - type. Skill - type buffs allow the protagonist to add or enhance skills, while bonus - type buffs are related to the character.
hits.Instructions:
Players control a protagonist, an assault soldier, who needs to keep moving and fend off enemy attacks during the battle to survive until the end.
Mobile devices:
Use rocker controls to move.
Desktop devices:
Use the W, A, S, D keys to move.

hits.Title: Ball Tales - The Holy Treasure
hits.Description:
The holy treasure is in danger! Warriors stole it and ran away.Join an exciting adventure to help the balls to take it back.

Tricky traps,deadly spikes and blades are on the way but balls are brave.

Puzzles are hard to solve but balls are clever.

A story like adventure, jump into action and help them.
hits.Instructions: Use W,A,D controls for keyboard.
hits.Key Features:
- 45 challenging levels
- 3 different worlds
    -Jungle,mine and temple
- 7 kinds of balls
    - Blue ball
    - Orange ball
    - Zombie
    - Mummy
    - Skeleton
    - Metal ball
    - Super hero ball
- Many kinds of enemies
     -Bomberman,worm,mole,spikey ball and more…
- Many puzzles to solve
    - Roll the balls and move the blocks,think twice before you get into action.
- Story based gameplay

hits.Title: StoryZoo Games
hits.Description: StoryZoo Games is a collection of educational video games that is perfect for kids, with several minigames exploring the world of StoryZoo. It features various edutainment games like memory, word games, picture puzzles, and more. This will help get kids acquainted with zoo and farm animals alike while learning words in a playful way.
hits.Instructions: The game’s main location is a classroom in which children are invited to play minigames. The minigames are shown by lit-up game elements. When clicking these, the corresponding minigame will be started. All of the minigames can easily be controlled using the mouse or touchscreen.

hits.Title: Best Classic Solitaire
hits.Description: Classic Solitaire, or Klondike, is a timeless single-player card game. Arrange a standard deck of cards in ascending order by suit, employing strategic moves and stacking, to ultimately organize all cards into four foundation piles.
hits.Instructions: In Classic Solitaire, start with a shuffled standard deck. Arrange cards in seven columns, alternating face-down and face-up cards. Build descending sequences by alternating colors. Move cards between columns to uncover hidden ones. Aim to organize all cards into four foundation piles, one for each suit, in ascending order.

hits.Title: Bubble Shooter - Classic Match 3 Pop Bubbles
hits.Description:
In this game, your objective is to clear the level by popping all the bubbbles. Match three or more bubbles of the same color to make them burst and earn points. But be careful - if you let the bubbles reach the bottom of the screen, it's game over!

With 50+ levels to explore and multiple game modes to choose from, Bubble Shooter offers endless hours of fun and excitement.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter special bubbles with unique powers that can help you clear the level faster. Use bombs to destroy multiple bubbles at once, or unleash the disco bubble to pop any one color on the board.
hits.Instructions: With colorful graphics, catchy sound effects, and intuitive gameplay, Bubble Shooter is a must-play for puzzle game lovers of all ages. So what are you waiting for? Start popping those bubbles and see how high you can score!
hits.Key Features:
Exciting Power-ups and upgrades
Choose from multiple characters
With different level types, you’ll never get bored.
Fun and interesting gameplay
Beautiful graphics

hits.Title: Solitaire Klondike - Treasure Island
hits.Description:
Set sail on a thrilling pirate adventure! Explore mysterious islands, uncover hidden treasures, and help a fearless heroine escape ruthless villains.
Customize your experience with beautifully illustrated card decks, stunning animations, and magical boosters to tackle challenges.
Relax between games with mesmerizing music and lively animated characters. Dive into a world of adventure, mystery, and enchantment!
hits.Instructions: Sort all cards into four suit piles from Ace to King. Move cards between seven stacks, alternating colors and descending ranks. Groups of cards can be moved for strategic plays. Review the deck as needed and enjoy the challenge of mastering this classic solitaire game!

hits.Title: Solitaire Emperor - Secrets of Fate
hits.Description:
Enter the magical world of Tarot in this captivating solitaire adventure! Each card tells a story, and every level presents a new puzzle. Meet iconic Tarot characters like the wise Hermit and bold Knight of Swords as they guide your journey.
A dark sorcerer threatens to unravel the Arcana's magic—only you can uncover its secrets, solve riddles, and restore balance. Will your intuition and strategy save this mystical realm?
hits.Instructions:
Clear all cards from the field to complete the level by following the classic sequence: Ace, King, Queen, Jack, 10, and so on.

Earn more coins by keeping cards in the deck and building long chains. Use gold cards to extend chains or as a last resort when no moves remain.

hits.Title: Yoga Master - Flex Running
hits.Description:
Yoga Master - Flex Running is an addictive 3D running game with different levels that will challenge even the fastest reflex.

Move your character to adjust the pose and dodge the incoming obstacles while picking some money on the way. But beware! Sometimes this stack of cash is a trap.
hits.Instructions:
HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap or swipe to begin a level.
- Swipe to move the character.
- Adjust the pose to dodge the furniture.
- Don't let anything hit you until the end.

hits.Title: Tile Farm Story - Matching Game
hits.Description: Are you tired of your dull daily routine? Discover the magical world of the remote corners of the Earth where life is in harmony with nature. Help the heroines in the game build parks and nature reserves in the most exotic countries and populate them with the greatest variety of animals. But first, they will have to solve the mystery of the inheritance that the Stone sisters were left by their mysterious Grandpa.
hits.Instructions: Mouse click or tap to play
hits.Key Features:
- colorful and varied locations in the most amazing corners of the world
- hundreds of fascinating levels assembled using tile collection mechanics
- many useful boosters that help with completion
- a rich and surprising story
- many unique animals with strong personalities and fun animations
- the ability to train your thinking skills and relax in the company of an interesting game that combines the traditions of mahjong with new mechanics

hits.Title: Emoji Smasher - Smiley Game
hits.Description:
Emoji Smasher is a Hyper Casual game to make you smile while playing!
Guess the emoticon expressions in this fast-paced challenge! Tap on emojis and win this lively, emoji-filled adventure.
hits.Instructions: Tap on the Sad and Angry Smileys and make them happy. One-tap easy-to-play with stunning visual effects and addictive game-play mechanics.
hits.Key Features:
• Be careful of the Happy Smileys already they are happy, if you tap on them, they will pull you down.
• One-tap easy-to-play mechanics!
• Smile & level up to have fun, only sky is the limit!
• Unlimited challenging levels & different Emojis.
• Cute sounds by Emojis that will make you to fall in love!
• Enjoy the Emoji Puzzle fun!
• This Fluffy Smasher game is the new age of Facemoji Tap Titans.

hits.Title: Save Baby Capybaras - Pull Pin
hits.Description:
“Save Baby Capybaras - Pull Pin” is a cute puzzle game where you must figure out which pins to pull in order to rescue the baby capybaras and bring them to their father capybara. Be strategic, as some pins don’t need to be pulled, while others can disrupt your game. Unlock character skins using the rubies you earn and challenge yourself across various levels!
Enjoy the game and raise your name on the global leaderboard!
hits.Instructions:
Tap the pins to pull them.
Tap the Capybara to move him.
Acids damage capybara and pins, except small capybaras.
Enter the portal to teleport to another location.
The timed pin will break when it expires.
The Hazmat suit offers acid protection.
hits.Key Features:
⭐ 100 levels to play
⭐ Global leaderboard
⭐ Shop to unlock character skins
⭐ Mini games
⭐ 6 languages supported: Russian, English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Hindi

hits.Title: Volley Beans - Volleyball Game
hits.Description: Get ready to become the best volleyball player of all time! Jump right now into this cute and simple, yet challenging volleyball game!
hits.Instructions: Tap to jump, bounce and smash! That's all you need to know!
hits.Key Features: A lot of characters to customise, a lot of enemies to compete, and a lot of stadiums to unlock!

hits.Title: Money Factory - Earn a Billion
hits.Description: Prepare for a thrilling journey into the world of finance! As the owner of a money factory, you'll build and link mechanisms to boost your earnings with every step. Overcome exciting challenges where strategy is crucial to your success. Collect powerful boosters, create combos, and unlock new levels to discover even more ways to grow your fortune. Upgrade your factory to fast-track your rise to riches and become a financial powerhouse!
hits.Instructions:
1. Making money is easy at first, but you'll need creativity and luck to keep growing your factory.
2. Buy boosters, fill the field, and multiply your earnings.
3. Hold your finger or mouse button to move boosters, release to place or combine two identical ones.
4. Aim to become a billionaire!

hits.Title: Hero Story - Monsters Crossing
hits.Description:
An addictive hyper-casual game.
Build the bridges nicely to cross as many deeps as possible.
Use the special items (Attack, Second Chance, Accurate Eye, Jump) wisely to help your hero on his adventure.
There are many nice themes and cool heroes to unlock.
A global leaderboard is also supported. Try to win high scores and raise your name on the leaderboard.
ENJOY NOW!
hits.Instructions:
Tap the screen to extend the bridge. Release to lay it down and walk on it.
Use the special items wisely:
- Attack: Attacking the monsters.
- Second Chance: A be revived if fails.
- Accurate Eye: Helping build the bridge accurately.
- Jump: Allowing hero to jump across the small gap between the bridge and the platform.
hits.Key Features:
- Cool backgrounds to unlock
- Cool hero characters to unlock
- Achievements
- Daily rewards

hits.Title: Koi Fish Pond - Idle Merge Game
hits.Description:
An addictive idle merging game. Build your own Koi fish company and grow your business.
Release your Koi fishes into the pond and earn money every time they cross the finish line. Buy new Koi fishes (or collect them from the gift boxes), and merge the same level Koi fishes to upgrade into a new type. The higher-level of the Koi fishes, the more money you will earn. Use your earnings to buy upgrade packages in the Shop to help you make money faster!
hits.Instructions:
Tap and drag to release your Koi fishes into the pond and earn money every time they cross the finish line.
Tap on the fish in the tank to move it back.
Drag and drop a fish on another one (of the same type) to merge them into a new/upgraded type.
You can buy more tanks and additional fish-fairways in the Shop.
hits.Key Features:
- An addictive game for all ages
- 30 types of cool Koi fishes are waiting for you to collect
- Upgrade packages in Shop
- Turbo mode
- Idle earnings
- Daily rewards
- Global leaderboard

hits.Title: Block Puzzle - Jewel Forest
hits.Description: An addictive block puzzle game that helps train your eyes and brain. It is a combination between the Tetris and Jewels game styles.
hits.Instructions: Drag the jewel blocks to the desired places, to form full jewel lines (horizontal or vertical) in order to blast them.
hits.Key Features:
- Global leaderboard
- 8x8 board (bigger blocks)
- Option to continue the game
- 6 languages supported: English, Russian, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese

hits.Title: Best Classic Mahjong Connect
hits.Description: Classic Mahjong Connect is an engaging tile-matching game that challenges players to clear the board by connecting identical tiles with a line that can make no more than two turns. Strategy and quick thinking are key as you work to unravel intricate patterns and uncover matching pairs in this timeless and captivating puzzle adventure.
hits.Instructions: Match and clear identical tiles with a line of up to two turns. Empty the board by connecting pairs.

hits.Title: Jurassic Run
hits.Description: The adventure trip went bad! There is a bloodthirsty dinosaur behind your back! You can't bother with descending one rock and climbing back another one. You have to use the stick to pass to the other side. Be sure to make the stick accurate, otherwise, you will fall or get eaten! And don't forget to collect the dinosaur's eggs to get a second chance.
hits.Instructions: Stretch the stick so you may pass to the other side and run away from a dinosaur. Collect the dinosaur's eggs on the way by walking under the stick and climbing back. Be sure to make the stick accurate, not too long or short. And don't bump into the rocks during collecting the eggs! Improve your estimations and escape as far as you can.
hits.Key Features:
Addictive gameplay
Simple controls
Charming graphics
Special atmosphere
Catchy music

hits.Title: Mahjong Deluxe
hits.Description: Rediscover a great classic with Mahjong Deluxe   Challenge your patience and your capacity of thinking in this puzzle game  Associate the different tiles to make them disappear and empty each levelMahjong is an extremely simple game that will give you hours of pleasure  At the beginning of the game a board covered by tiles of mahjong will appear in front of you

hits.Title: Find It - Find The Differences
hits.Description: Find It is an engaging puzzle game that tests your observation skills as you search for subtle differences between two nearly identical images. With colorful visuals and beautifully designed scenes, each level presents a fresh challenge. Whether you're spotting tiny details or uncovering hidden objects, Find It will keep you entertained and focused. Hone your attention to detail, enjoy the excitement of finding every difference, and experience hours of fun suitable for all ages!
hits.Instructions: Click on the pictures to carefully examine each detail, spot the differences, and successfully complete the levels.

hits.Title: Get
hits.Description: Do you like math or logic games Thanks to this amusing number connecting you will start to love it Match the same adjacent numbers to convert them to a higher number Match further to reach  and beyond Easy to play hard to master

hits.Title: Tile Connect - Pair Matching
hits.Description:
Tile Connect is a tile-matching game for both kids and adults. Play and relax in your free time!  

It offers beautiful themes and music for much fun! With the memory of your brain and concentration of your mind, you search pairs and connect to turn them into stars! The higher level you get more challenging it is, but various tools and treasure boxes are there for help! So play and enjoy it now! Classic and boring merging games. This is a new, free, and cool game for boys and girls.
hits.Instructions:
Connect two same tiles to eliminate them with a polyline. 

The polyline contains no more than 3 inflection points. 

Get harder for a higher level with more grids and types of pairs. 

4 valuable tools are there to help. 

More scores and the higher level you get when you win. 

Higher enough to get a treasure box. 

There is a time limit.
hits.Key Features:
✓ Game is totally FREE.

✓ Easy for all kids and adults to play. 

✓ Train your memory and concentration. 

✓ You can play it everywhere. 

✓ We offer elaborate themes of images. So much fun! 

✓ There are elaborate game sound effects and music which make you feel good. 

✓ Higher level and more scores you get, more challenges you will encounter! 

✓ Support: 4 useful tools are there for help you! 

✓ Support: Treasure box keep you motivated! 

✓ Woody user interface gets you closer to nature and relax you.

hits.Title: Solitaire Classic - Klondike
hits.Description: Solitaire Classic is a game most of us have played at some time - here we have versions of this game made with beautiful game boards and eye-catching pieces. We've carefully designed the game to have a smooth and modern feel to it and threw in some classic, Solitaire Classic game elements we all love.
hits.Instructions: Drag cards and start building sequences of the same suit in each foundation pile in ascending order, from ace to king
hits.Key Features:
Undo moves
Track your moves and time
Enjoy the clean design, animations, and sounds
Enjoy nice & smooth gameplay that'll keep you coming for more
Enjoy special challenges & surprises
Play on your mobile phone, tablet or desktop
And many more!

hits.Title: Sort It - Water Sort Puzzle
hits.Description: Sort It - Water Sort Puzzle is a fun and addictive puzzle game! Test your intelligence by solving this bottle sort water puzzle. Try to sort the colored water in the glasses until all colors are in the same glass. A challenging yet relaxing game to exercise your brain!
hits.Instructions:
- Tap any glass to pour water to another glass.
- The rule is that you can only pour the water if it is linked to the same color and there's enough space on the glass.
- Try not to get stuck - but don’t worry, you can always restart the level at any time.
hits.Key Features:
Features:
- One finger control.
- Over 10000 puzzles are unique, full of fun, and amazing challenges!
- Beautiful graphics and satisfying sound effects.
- No penalties & time limits; you can enjoy sort it at your own pace!

hits.Title: Spot The Difference - Seasons
hits.Description: Find the difference between the two pictures without using any hint. Discover all 5 game modes in 4 Seasons. Feel yourself like a true detective and unlock 80 levels of beautiful images and amazing scenery of spring, summer, fall, and winter.
hits.Instructions: Find the difference between the two pictures without using any hint. Discover all 5 game modes in 4 Seasons. Feel yourself like a true detective and unlock 80 levels of beautiful images and amazing scenery of spring, summer, fall, and winter.
hits.Key Features:
Popular Puzzle game
Beautiful graphics
Relaxing
Hints
4 Seasons

hits.Title: Magnetic Merge - Number Master
hits.Description:
Merge numbers by adding tiles with the same number to the field next to already placed tiles (vertically or horizontally).
Each merge will create a new tile with a number one higher.

Boosters:
- Remove any tile from the field;
- Remove all tiles with the selected number;
- Refresh: allows to change tile form the "NEXT" up to 5 times.

Each booster is available only once in a single game.

Challenge yourself in this number master merge puzzle. Try to get the higher tile and beet your best score.
hits.Instructions: Left mouse click to interact
hits.Key Features: One touch control

hits.Title: Barrel Roller - Amazing Runner
hits.Description:
Collect and stack barrels, avoid obstacles, and make the highest barrel stack ever! 
Unlimited levels of stacking satisfaction!
hits.Instructions: Swipe left-right to collect barrels and avoid obstacles.

hits.Title: Word Scramble - Family Tales
hits.Description: Want a distraction from the annoyances of daily life, or is your brain tired of solving exactly the same problems? Welcome to Word Scramble: Family Tales! Train your gray matter by solving word search puzzles and level up your vocabulary! An exciting family adventure, colorful locations and engaging play make this game hard to tear yourself away from. The story of a long-awaited child finally arriving in a family will come to life literally in front of your eyes.
hits.Instructions: Mouse click or tap to play
hits.Key Features:
- Solve puzzles!
 - Decorate interiors!
 - Create your own story!
 - Use powerful Boosters!
 - Level up your vocabulary!

hits.Title: Two Carts - Downhill
hits.Description: Two Carts - Downhill is a fast-paced arcade game where you control two carts simultaneously, each on its own obstacle-filled road. Use the left and right arrow keys to steer each cart independently, collecting components to score points. Pick up power-ups like Ice to slow down the game or Shield to protect against obstacles. As you progress, the game speeds up, challenging your reflexes and multitasking skills. How long can you keep both carts on track?
hits.Instructions:
On PC: 
Use the left arrow to control the cart on the left and the right arrow to control the cart on the right
You can control the carts by using the mouse clicking on the left or the right side of the game field.

On Mobile:
Tap the left or the right side of the screen to control the left or the right cart.
hits.Key Features:
Control two carts at the same time
Collect components to increase your high score
Collect powerful power-ups to boost your experience

hits.Title: Connect Master - Classic Game
hits.Description:
Connect Master - Classic Game is an adventure-themed connect pair matching puzzle game with various game theme skins. Let you go on an adventure as an explorer while having fun and relaxing simultaneously. You can feel the warmth and harmony of the village tribe on the way and play on the sunny ocean beach. You can also visit the icy animal kingdom, find the mysterious magic forest and enjoy the desert culture. So, come on and try it out!

This classic tile-matching puzzle game is fun and casual but also challenging! Hurry up and play this matching elimination puzzle game and prove that you are the master of connecting matching squares with action. Hope you have fun and enjoy playing!
hits.Instructions:
1. To connect and match, you need to find two tiles with the same pattern in a pile of pattern tiles.
2. In connecting two tiles with the same pattern, you can only use a maximum of three straight lines to connect them.
3. If you encounter difficulties, do not be discouraged; you can use powerful game props to get help.
4. You must match all the tiles successfully within the time limit; otherwise, the challenge fails.
hits.Key Features:
1. Colorful collections of tiles - connect cute animals, beautiful flowers, fruits & other cute things, impact your visual senses.
2. Set the game mall; you can buy the game props you need with gold as you like.
3. Game resurrection function, in case you fail to challenge, allows you to resurrect and challenge the game again.
4. You can log in to your Google and Facebook accounts and automatically save the level upgrade progress so that you can play anytime, anywhere!
5. Multi-language options

hits.Title: Submarine Attack
hits.Description: Command a submarine, destroy enemy ships with torpedoes, unlock new weapons, and conquer the ocean. Engage in thrilling naval battles, use unique abilities, face numerous enemies, and wield powerful armaments to achieve victory.
hits.Instructions:
Mobile: Hold your finger and drag in different directions to aim at the enemy. Press the red button to attack.
PC (mouse): Hold the mouse button and drag in different directions to aim at the enemy. Press the red button to attack.

Spin the Wheel: Earn gems through the Spin Wheel to unlock skins or trim your snake segments.

Collect Gems: Gather blue, green, and purple gems during gameplay for additional rewards.

Leaderboards: Track your top 3 scores for each mode and challenge yourself to improve.

Cross-Platform Play: Enjoy the game on both PC and mobile devices, with support for both landscape and portrait modes.

hits.Title: Mushroom Fever Match 3
hits.Description:
Immerse yourself in the magical forest with Mushroom Fever - Match 3! Bright and cheerful mushrooms replace traditional crystals, adding a fresh twist to the classic match-3 genre. This game will bring you hours of thrilling fun and bursts of excitement!

Match groups of three or more mushrooms, complete engaging tasks, and unlock new levels! Each level brings unique puzzles and fresh challenges. The more matches you make, the more points and bonuses you’ll earn!
hits.Instructions:
1. Collect Mushrooms: Your goal is to gather as many groups of three or more matching mushrooms as possible. Swap them around to create rows or columns of identical mushrooms.
2. Complete Tasks: Each level has unique objectives, such as collecting a specific number of mushrooms or reaching a target score within a limited number of moves.
3 .Use Bonuses and Boosters: The game features special power-ups to help you progress faster.
hits.Key Features:
Step into the magical world of the enchanted forest with Mushroom Fever Match 3! This delightful match-3 puzzle game replaces traditional crystals with charming, quirky mushrooms, delivering hours of exciting gameplay and a burst of fun-filled emotions.

A Journey Through the Enchanted Forest

Immerse yourself in a mystical forest where lively mushrooms become your trusted companions. Each mushroom has its own personality and charm, bringing a unique touch to the adventure. Your mission? Restore harmony to the forest by solving puzzles, completing challenges, and uncovering the secrets of this magical realm.

Gameplay: Easy to Learn, Challenging to Master

Mushroom Fever - Match 3 uses the classic match-3 mechanic but adds fresh twists to keep things engaging. Here’s what makes it stand out:

• Dynamic Mushrooms: Say goodbye to static gems—these adorable mushrooms are animated and react to your every move, making the gameplay feel alive.

• Bonuses and Boosters: Create chains of matches to activate unique power-ups, from explosive blasts to row-clearing streaks, unleashing thrilling chain reactions.

• Gradual Difficulty: Hundreds of levels offer increasing challenges, from scoring specific points to completing tricky missions within limited moves.

• Strategic Depth: Choose when and how to use boosters and bonuses to develop your own approach for conquering each level.

Unique Features

• Charming Mushrooms: These aren’t just game pieces—they’re lively characters that add personality and charm to the gameplay.

• Hundreds of Levels: The game evolves with each level, providing a steady increase in complexity to keep you hooked.

• Vibrant Graphics and Effects: Every match is accompanied by colorful animations and satisfying sound effects, making each move feel rewarding.

• Accessible Yet Challenging: The mechanics are intuitive for beginners, but the higher levels offer a strategic challenge for experienced players.

Mushroom Fever Match 3 masterfully combines vibrant visuals, engaging gameplay, and strategic depth. It’s perfect for quick gaming sessions or for those who want to dive deep into the magical forest for hours on end. Match mushrooms, unlock power-ups, and prove yourself as the ultimate puzzle solver!

Download now and discover a world full of wonder and fun! ?
